page.title: 07Westerhope First School.
page.content: Westerhope First School has a staff of forty seven,of which fourteen are teachers. There are two hundred and forty seven children in the main school and fifty nine in the nursery. Westerhope First School was formed because Beaumont and West Park were next to each other and had too few pupils. Mrs Dix,the headteacher, thinks the merger went well. She says the pupils have reacted very well to it. Money given to the school would help to buy books and repair the old buildings. Mrs Dix said that it would be good to have a sports hall. Mrs Dix said that she likes teaching the children but dosn't like organising repairs etc.
